Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now it's time to begin the <RED>Fireworks
Festival</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It'll take a while until the fireworks
are ready. Just hang out until then.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. The fireworks are ready.
Let's set 'em off!

It didn't last long, but it was
beautiful! Simply fantastic!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, princess. I'm assuming you're
going to watch the fireworks with me,
right?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on then. I know a great place where
we can watch them together.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, princess. It's nice that you were
gazing at the fireworks, but your mouth
was wide open.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I-I ruined the mood? That's my line. You
should thank me for holding back my
laughter.
<PAGE>
What? Are you pouting now? Hah. You can
be such a kid. Pout all you want, it 
just makes you look more adorable.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. You're going with me again
next year, right? I'll be waiting.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Let's go watch the
fireworks together.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's going to start soon, so we'd better
hurry. Follow me.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Aww, man. I was hoping it would be just
the two of us.
<PAGE>
Well, because with everyone around, we
can't even hold hands...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Whoa! <MYNAME>! Y-Your hand!
<PAGE>
No, wait! Don't let go! I-It's really
nice. I hope you never let go.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Let's come again
next year to look at the fireworks.
It's a promise.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hi, <MYNAME>. Let's go watch the
fireworks together.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They're going to start soon. We should
get going.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I didn't think we'd be able to watch the
fireworks together. I feel like a little
kid again. It's so exciting.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Huh? You think I'm lying? I wasn't
kidding! Give me your hand.
<PAGE>
See? Can you feel my heart? Now do you
believe me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hahaha. Even in the dark I
can tell how red your face is!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's come watch the fireworks again
next year. I can't wait to do this
again.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, there you are. Would you care to
go and watch the fireworks together?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Then let us go. I will take you to a
place with a wonderful view.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is it too hot here? I have brought some
iced tea. Please have some.
<PAGE>
How does it taste? Good? That's a
relief. I made that blend just for
today.
<PAGE>
You look happy. Even more so than when
enjoying the fireworks. Is it just
my imagination?
<PAGE>
Heh heh, my apologies. It was only a
joke.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I hope we can come to view the fireworks
again next year.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. We're going to see
the fireworks together, right? Let's go.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come with me. I know a place where you
can get a great view of the fireworks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It feels awkward watching them together
surrounded by so many people. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Wait, no. It's not that I don't want to
watch them with you. If that were the
case, I wouldn't have asked you out.
<PAGE>
I'd been looking forward to watching the
fireworks with you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm not kidding. Can't you tell how red
I'm getting? Don't make me say the rest.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hey, let's come again next year.
Promise?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. I want to watch the fireworks
together with you. Would you like that?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's about to start. Shall we go,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, is something wrong? You seem
to be staring at me. Aren't you going
to watch the fireworks?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm flattered that you would
want to look at me over the fireworks,
but it does seem a bit embarrassing.
<PAGE>
What? You didn't even realize you were
doing it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hahaha, thank you, <MYNAME>.
I didn't know you liked me that much.
How wonderful.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, let's come again next year.
It only occurs once a year, so next time
make sure you watch the show.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>. Let's go look at some
fireworks!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh oh. It's about to start. I found the
perfect place just for today!
<PAGE>
Let's move!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hahaha... I love seeing your face lit up
by the fireworks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Haha... Oh, <MYNAME>. Your face is red.
Are you okay?
<PAGE>
Okay, okay. I'll stop teasing you. I'm
sorry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But in exchange, can you...
hold my hand? I really like your hand,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, let's come see the fireworks
again next year. Promise me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, I want to go watch the fireworks
with you. What do you say?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. Then it's settled! Now let's go!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a little out of the blue, but
what would you do if I asked you to kiss
me right now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Haha. I'm joking!<RED>∀</RED>
I wouldn't be able to with so many
people watching.
<PAGE>
But the mood is wonderful here. If we
were alone, then I just might have asked
for it...<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was fun. Let's come watch the
fireworks again next year.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... Let's go see the fireworks.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It'll start soon. Come here.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you know what? Um...
<PAGE>
I wish we had some hand held fireworks.
Let's get some next time... Can we?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Thank you... <MYNAME>, I love you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's come watch the fireworks again
next year...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you like to go see the fireworks
together? We may as well go watch them
together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh no. It is about to begin. Let's
hurry.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't believe we're watching the
fireworks together!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Since we're watching the fireworks
together, that means....
Well...
<PAGE>
It means now everyone can know about our
relationship.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Thank you so much for letting me
watch them with you. I'm so happy right
now.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Let's come watch the fireworks together
again next year.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, come on! Let's go watch the
fireworks! We can't waste an opportunity
to have fun together!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It's going to start soon!
Let's go! Let's go!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, isn't it hot? I brought you
a fan. I'll cool you down.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>How does that feel? Cool I bet. Hehe. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But now I'm getting hot. <MYNAME>, can
I scoot a little closer to you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>See? Now we can both enjoy the fan.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh? Look at you, <MYNAME>. Your face
is all red. That's so cute!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, let's come watch the fireworks
together again next year.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. We should go see the fireworks
together.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Come on, <MYNAME>. You know a good place,
don't you? Hurry up and take me there.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fireworks are great! They're powerful
and exciting! Oh, my heart is pounding.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What is it? You want to know if I get
nervous being with you, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I'm not nervous, I'll tell you that.
You're kind of like a pet to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Oh, don't look so down. I'm saying
you're cute. So cute that I want to
hug you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>. Let's come together again next
year. It's a promise.
